```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
f <- st_read("../../data/friches/02_preprocessing/friches_points.gpkg")
```

```{r}
stats_dep <- f %>% 
  group_by(dep) %>% 
  summarize(surface = sum(site_surface)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(surface))
```

```{r}
View(stats_dep)
```
